modName: Silly Guard and Stormcloak helm retexture
summary: Silly look for guards and stormcloak soldiers. Helmet retexture.
descriptionHtml:
Silly look for guards and stormcloak soldiers. Retexture of helmets.
Every town has it\'s own looking guard.

Textures aren\'t perfect because other half of the helmetmesh uses more of texture (weird clipping in the middle). 
I may update this mod and replace guard\'s helmetmesh with something better that uses whole face as one texture later to make this look better.
author: raatorotta
